text:
[Verse]
Dancing in the moonlight
Chasing dreams tonight
Gonna reach the skyline
Hold on to the bright

[Verse 2]
Feet on the ground now
Eyes on the last bow
Let the rhythm take me
In this endless glow

[Chorus]
Shooting stars above us
Lighting up the dark
Wish upon a feeling
Let it leave a mark

[Verse 3]
Heartbeats like thunder
Magic pulling under
Lose ourselves to wonder
In the neon's color

[Chorus]
Shooting stars above us
Lighting up the dark
Wish upon a feeling
Let it leave a mark

[Bridge]
No time for hesitation
Just pure elation
In this constellation
Feel the elevation
title: Shooting Stars
